content: I think I'll add a small table with some refreshments, like lemonade and cookies, near the family reunion photo area. That way, guests can take a break, grab a snack, and enjoy the photos while they're there. And for the photo booth area, I'll make sure to have a few fun signs and props that fit the Enchanted Garden theme, like a "Bloom Where You Are Planted" sign or some flower-shaped sunglasses. What do you think?
